headline: Why Comfort Systems USA (FIX) Is Up 7.9% After Record Tech Backlog, Dividend Hike And Buybacks
summary: Recently, Comfort Systems USA reported that strong demand from technology clients, especially for data center and semiconductor projects, has driven a record multi‑year backlog extending into 2026 and 2027, alongside a 20% increase in its quarterly dividend and continued use of its share repurchase program. headline: 2 Unpopular Stocks That Deserve a Second Chance and 1 We Ignore
